items.sentence: It looks like I was right about Tom not showing up for the meeting.
It never occurred to me that Tom might feel that same way Mary did.
I\'d love to be able to find more time that I could spend relaxing.
It seems like I\'m the only one here who knows how to speak French.
You should probably tell Tom who\'ll be meeting him at the station.
You should tell Tom that you don\'t plan to be in Boston next week.
You should\'ve known better than to put yourself in that situation.
You\'d be amazed how long it takes Tom to get ready in the morning.
Frankly speaking, it\'s difficult to understand why you want to go.
I can\'t find my glasses. I may have left them behind on the train.
